Description: eSM module: System error detected:Error detected during dynamizationof STO signalParameter _SigLatched Bit 23
eSM module: System error detected:Nonvolatile memory incorrectchecksum (default values loaded)Parameter _WarnLatched Bit 23
eSM module: Safety modulereplaced (default values loaded)Parameter _WarnLatched Bit 23
Cause: This safety module has not beenconfigured with this drive. Theparameters have been reset to thedefault values.

Description: eSM module: Commutation positionParameter _SigLatched Bit 23
Cause: Encoder error or error in internalcommunication with the drivedetected (for example, EMI).
Correctives: Verify EMC. Verify encoderconnection. Contact your SchneiderElectric service representative.

Description: eSM module: Parameter checksumsnot identicalParameter _SigLatched Bit 23
Cause: Parameter of CPU_A is not identicalto parameter of CPU_B. Not possibleto load parameters into safetymodule eSM.
Correctives: Retry loading the parameters into thesafety module eSM. If the conditionpersists, contact your SchneiderElectric service representative.

Description: eSM module: System error detected:Boot program: Invalid addressParameter _WarnLatched Bit 23
Cause: Invalid write access of bootloader toflash memory range.

Description: eSM module: Safely Limited Speed(SLS) exceeded in machineoperating mode Automatic ModeParameter _SigLatched Bit 23
Cause: Drive velocity greater than configuredeSM speed limit.
Correctives: Reduce velocity of the drive or verifyeSM speed limit for machineoperating mode Automatic Mode.

Description: eSM module: Input ESMSTART lowinstead of high (automatic start)Parameter _SigLatched Bit 23
Cause: ESMSTART is configured forautomatic start and must be high atstart.
Correctives: Verify parameter configuration ofESMSTART. Verify wiring ofESMSTART.

Description: eSM module: Input ESMSTART highinstead of low (manual start)Parameter _SigLatched Bit 23
Cause: ESMSTART is configured for manualstart and must be low at start.
Correctives: Verify parameter configuration ofESMSTART. Verify wiring ofESMSTART.

Description: eSM module: Guard dooracknowledgment: Theacknowledgement signal is availablefor too long a time.Parameter _SigLatched Bit 23
Cause: The acknowledgement signal isavailable for more than 6 seconds.
Correctives: The acknowledgement signal mustbe available for less than 6 seconds.

Description: eSM module: System error detected:States of eSM state machines notidenticalParameter _SigLatched Bit 23
eSM module: Output AUXOUT1(cross fault to another outputdetected)Parameter _SigLatched Bit 23
Cause: Cross fault detection detected across fault to another output.

Description: eSM module: Output /INTERLOCK_OUT (cross fault to another outputdetected)Parameter _SigLatched Bit 23
Cause: Cross fault detection detected across fault to another output.

Description: eSM module: Output RELAY_OUT_A(cross fault to another outputdetected)Parameter _SigLatched Bit 23
Cause: Cross fault detection detected across fault to another output.
